original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 296.00/297.50 to dollar , bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 296.00 /297.50 against the US dollar in the spot market on Friday, while bond yields were down, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 302.00 /40 to the US dollar on Thursday after opening around 302.80/303.10 rupees.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 26.30/65 percent down from Thursday’s close at 26.55/65 percent.
